flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
清らかな　声で　歌を　聞かせて　あげると
１０００年の　眠りから　目を　覚ます。
人の　願いを　なんでも　かなえると　いう。

Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you
sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish
that people desire.

Jirachi può essere destato dal suo sonno millenario cantando
con una voce pura e cristallina. Riesce a realizzare ogni
desiderio espresso dalle persone.

Jirachi despertará de su letargo de miles de años si se le
canta con una voz pura. Dicen que este Pokémon hace
realidad cualquier deseo que se tenga.

Jirachi wird aus seinem tausendjährigen Schlaf erwachen,
wenn du ihm mit klarer Stimme etwas vorsingst. Es soll
angeblich alle Wünsche der Menschen erfüllen.

Jirachi dort depuis mille ans, mais il se réveillera si on lui
chante quelque chose avec une voix d’une grande pureté.
On raconte qu’il peut exaucer les vœux des gens.

밝고 맑은 목소리로 노래를 들려주면
1000년의 잠에서 깨어난다.
사람의 소원을 무엇이든 들어준다고 한다.

きよらかな　こえで　うたを　きかせて　あげると
１０００ねんの　ねむりから　めを　さます。
ひとの　ねがいを　なんでも　かなえると　いう。

目覚めた　とき　頭の　短冊に　書かれた
願いを　かなえると　いう　伝説を　もつ。
危険を　感じると　眠ったまま　戦う。

A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is
written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this
Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

La leggenda racconta che Jirachi realizza ogni desiderio
scritto su bigliettini che trova attaccati alla propria testa,
quando si sveglia. In caso di pericolo, lotta senza mai
svegliarsi.

Cuenta la leyenda que Jirachi hará realidad cualquier deseo
que se le escriba en las notas que lleva en la cabeza cuando
las lea tras salir de su letargo. Si este Pokémon siente peligro,
luchará sin haber llegado a despertarse.

Einer Legende nach erfüllt Jirachi jeden Wunsch, der auf einen
Notizzettel an seinem Kopf geschrieben wird. Wenn dieses
Pokémon Gefahr wittert, kämpft es bereits, bevor es überhaupt
aufgewacht ist.

Une légende raconte qu’à son réveil, Jirachi réalise n’importe
quel souhait inscrit sur les papiers collés sur sa tête.
Si ce Pokémon se sent en danger, il se défend sans même
se réveiller.

깨어났을 때 머리에 있는 종이에 적힌
소원을 이루어준다는 전설을 가졌다.
위험을 느끼면 잠든 채로 싸운다.

めざめた　とき　あたまの　たんざくに　かかれた
ねがいを　かなえると　いう　でんせつを　もつ。
きけんを　かんじると　ねむったまま　たたかう。

１０００年間で　７日だけ
目を　覚まし　どんな　願い事でも
かなえる　力を　使うという。

It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for
just one week every thousand years.

Ha l’abilità di realizzare ogni desiderio, ma soltanto
per una settimana ogni 1000 anni.

Se dice que puede otorgar cualquier deseo durante
una semana cada 1000 años.

Man sagt, es kann alle 1 000 Jahre für eine Woche
jeden Wunsch erfüllen.

On raconte qu’une fois tous les 1 000 ans, il a la
capacité d’exaucer tous les vœux durant une semaine.

1000년 중 7일 동안만 깨어나
모든 소원을 이루어주는
능력을 발휘한다고 한다.

１０００ねんかんで　７にちだけ
めを　さまし　どんな　ねがいごとでも
かなえる　ちからを　つかうという。

目覚めた　とき　頭の　短冊に
書かれた　願い事を　かなえると
大昔から　語り継がれてきた。

Generations have believed that any wish written on
a note on its head will come true when it awakens.

Da sempre si dice che al risveglio realizzi i desideri
scritti sulle striscioline attaccate in testa.

Desde antaño se dice que concederá los deseos
escritos en las notas de su cabeza cuando se
despierte.

Wenn Jirachi erwacht, erfüllt es die Wünsche,
die man auf die Zettel an seinem Kopf geschrieben hat.

On raconte qu’à son réveil, il exauce les vœux écrits
sur les rubans de papier de sa tête.

깨어났을 때 머리의 종이에
쓴 소원을 이루어준다고
먼 옛날부터 구전되었다.

めざめた　とき　あたまの　たんざくに
かかれた　ねがいごとを　かなえると
おおむかしから　かたりつがれてきた。

It is said to have the ability to
grant any wish for just one week
every thousand years.

It is said to have the ability to
grant any wish for just one week
every thousand years.

It is said to have the ability to
grant any wish for just one week
every thousand years.

On raconte qu’une fois tous les
mille ans, il a la capacité d’exaucer
tous les vœux durant une semaine.

It is said to have the ability to
grant any wish for just one week
every thousand years.

On raconte qu’une fois tous les
mille ans, il a la capacité d’exaucer
tous les vœux durant une semaine.

Generations have believed that any
wish written on a note on its head
will come true when it awakens.

Generations have believed that any
wish written on a note on its head
will come true when it awakens.

It is said to have the ability to
grant any wish for just one week
every thousand years.

It is said to have the ability to

every thousand years.

It is said to have the ability to
grant any wish for just one week
every thousand years.

It is said to make any wish come true.
It is awake for only seven days out of
a thousand years.

It is said to make any wish come true.
It is awake for only seven days out of
a thousand years.

JIRACHI is said to make wishes come true.
While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell
envelops the body to protect it from
enemies.

JIRACHI will awaken from its sleep of
a thousand years if you sing to it in a
voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that
people desire.

A legend states that JIRACHI will make
true any wish that is written on notes
attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will
fight without awakening.
